title: Nice Two Bedroom Apartment City Of Reseda
posting_body: ['Nice two-story building with 23 units only, gated entrance with an intercom system, sparkling swimming pool, laundry room, surveillance cameras around the complex, and gated parking with extra storage space.', 'The building is located in the heart of Reseda with easy access to the 101 freeway.', 'For more information or to schedule a viewing, please contact our Property Managers Frances and Mariah at', 'show contact info', '.', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Bedrooms: 2 Bed', 'Bathrooms: 1 Bath', 'Parking: 1 Space', 'Lease Duration: 1 Year (See Details Below)', 'Deposit: 1 month (OAC)', 'Pets Policy: Cats & Dogs OK', 'Laundry: Shared', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'UNIT DESCRIPTION', 'Spacious living room with fresh paint, wood floors, wall A/C, large window with new wooden horizontal blinds that brightens up the room.', 'Dining area with fresh paint, new wood floors, ceiling fan with a modern light fixture, and a large window with new wooden horizontal blinds', 'Kitchen with nice flooring, ceramic tiled countertops, all stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, gas stove/oven, and an over the range microwave, stainless steel sink with a tall spout faucet, and window above with new wooden horizontal blinds, lots of cabinets, and a new light fixture.', 'Hallway with fresh paint, closets/cabinets for extra storage, and a modern light fixture.', 'Bedroom with fresh paint, wood floors, spacious closet with sliding mirrored doors, new ceiling fan with a modern light fixture, and a window with new wooden horizontal blinds.', 'Bathroom has new tile flooring, a new vanity with a large mirror and light sconce above, bathtub with tiled walls, mirrored medicine cabinet, and new accessories.', 'This unit comes with 1 dedicated parking space', '*This is a 2nd-Floor/Upper Unit', 'For additional Ben Leeds Property listings go to <URL> or call our Leasing Agent', 'show contact info', '.', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cat and Dogs friendly – under 25 lbs.', '(weight at maturity); No aggressive breeds: Chows, Pit Bulls, Dobermans, Rottweilers, German Shepard, and a mix of aggressive breeds.', 'Pet Rent and Deposit may apply.', 'Other Terms and Requirements:', '1-year lease term; Security deposit is determined by your credit, typically 1-month rent; Online Application is preferred and can be processed faster than a paper application; $30 Application fee per person (18 years and older) can be paid with credit or debit card for online application or with money order and cashier check for paper application;', 'No evictions; No foreclosures / bankruptcies in the last 5 years; Two (2) forms of current government issued ID: Driver’s License, Passport, SSN card, Military ID, Visa, etc; Proof of Income: last 3 months of check stub’s, or checking / saving account, or current W2.', 'Renter’s insurance is required.', 'Equal Housing Opportunity Provider', '*Pricing and availability is subject to change without notice*', 'Photos may vary from actual unit and are for representational purposes only and subject to variances.', 'Variances may include, but are not limited to, views and exposure to light, finishes for the final product, as well as layout and included features in the finished product.']
